channel.title: Pharma-Etf on Archive 03

item.title: Pharma ETF $PPH: A Deep Dive into Its Allure and Pitfalls
item.description: A deep-dive analysis of the VanEck Pharmaceutical ETF ($PPH). Three characters debate the explosive growth potential of its concentrated strategy, focusing on innovators like Eli Lilly, against the clear pitfalls of high valuation and concentration risk.
